name: Uchan Sun
bioHTML: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars. My works range from generative animation to interactive installation and AI practices, especially chatbots.

events.title: Artist Q&A - Generative Politics
events.desc: An opportunity to watch demonstrations of our artist's work alongside in-depth insight into their process. There is also the chance to connect with them through live Q&A and conversation surrounding the theme 'Generative Poetics'.
